verb.description: Attempt to sell (something), typically by pestering people in an aggressive or bold manner.
Offer racing tips for a share of any resulting winnings.

noun.description: A person soliciting custom or business, typically in an aggressive or bold manner.
A person who offers racing tips for a share of any resulting winnings.

determiner.description: Used before the name of a city to refer to its high society or people of importance.

origin: French, suggested by le tout Paris all (of) Paris, used to refer to Parisian high society.
